text: 'ayuha almuslimun ansytm afeal bani 'israyyl, ftmet nufusikum 'ana ysddiq alyhwd bdynkm? waqad kan elmawhm yasmaeun kalam allah min altwrat, thuma yuharifunah bisarfih 'iilaa ghyr menah alsahih baed ma eqlu hqyqth, 'aw bthryf alfazh, wahum yaelamun 'anahum yuharifun kalam rabu alealamin emdana wkdhbana
